items.title: LittleBigPlanet™ Mash-up
items.description:
Mix the crazy, non-stop creativity of LittleBigPlanet™ into the endless fun and freedom of Minecraft with this special mashup pack.
Sackboy®, Sackgirl®, OddSock, Toggle and Swoop will decorate your Minecraft universe with a whole heap of LBP characters, creatures and stuff.
Only available for Minecraft on PlayStation®4.

items.title: Mario Mash-Up
items.description: Super Mario meets Minecraft! This Mash-Up Pack contains a Super Mario-style Texture Pack, Skin Pack and a Super Mario-themed world to explore!
